entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
